title: Provided, if the building abuts another road of 6 m or more and clear space of 9m at ground level is available including abutting road or building abuts another road of 9m then this condition shall not be insisted upon
clause_text: Provided, if the building abuts another road of 6 m or more and clear space of 9m at ground level is available including abutting road or building abuts another road of 9m then this condition shall not be insisted upon.
